## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Visual Studio cache files
.vs/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
.nuget/
packages/
*.nuspec

# DotNet artifacts
artifacts/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.mdf
*.ldf

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# OS-specific
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
